pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1050ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or 10
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1660
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
